title: FDA Form 1571 Requirement
description: Form FDA 1571 (Investigational New Drug Application) must be included in Module 1 of all IND submissions.

metadata.documentation: Form FDA 1571 must be completed for all IND submissions

title: FDA Form 1572 Requirement
description: Form FDA 1572 (Statement of Investigator) must be included for each investigator in the clinical trial.

metadata.documentation: Form FDA 1572 is required for each investigator participating in the clinical trial

title: Cover Letter Requirement
description: A cover letter on company letterhead must be included with all submissions.

metadata.documentation: Cover letter should be on company letterhead and signed by authorized representative

title: PDF Format Requirements
description: All PDF documents must conform to FDA PDF specifications, be unsecured, and have all fonts embedded.

metadata.documentation: PDF documents must not have security settings, must have embedded fonts, and must be PDF version 1.4 or higher

title: Protocol Document Requirement
description: A complete Protocol document must be included for all clinical trials.

metadata.documentation: Protocol document must include detailed study design, methodology, and statistical analysis plan

title: eCTD Structure Compliance
description: Submission must adhere to FDA eCTD folder structure requirements.

metadata.documentation: All submissions must follow the FDA eCTD structure and naming conventions

title: XML Backbone Requirement
description: A valid XML backbone file must be included and correctly reference all documents.

metadata.documentation: XML backbone must conform to FDA DTD specifications and correctly reference all documents
